name: ORS Site Visit Report
description:
DQ0014 - v00.00.01 Last Modified: 09/08/12
This report returns lists of prisoners, for a single establishment, who do not have the following information recorded in Prison-NOMIS: Facial photo, legal status, nationality, religion, ethnicity, home address,PNC number, reception address. A summary tab is provided expressing the number of prisoners who fall into each 'missing' category and this is expressed as a percentage of the prison population.

dataset.name: All Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.PROFILE_CODE AS PROFILE_CODE, AT_NATIONALITY.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN NOT AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.DESCRIPTION IS NULL THEN AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.DESCRIPTION ELSE 'Undefined' END AS MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE END AS ETHNIC_CODE, AT_OFFENDER_PNC.IDENTIFIER AS IDENTIFIER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROFILE_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROFILE_DETAILS AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.IMPRISONMENT_STATUSES AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.PROFILE_CODES AT_NATIONALITY, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IDENTIFIERS AT_OFFENDER_PNC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = 'RELF') AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS = 'Y' OR AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = ('NAT')) AND (AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.PROFILE_TYPE AND AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_CODE (+) = AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.PROFILE_CODE) AND (AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = ('NAT')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_PNC.IDENTIFIER_TYPE (+) = 'PNC') AND (AT_OFFENDER_PNC.OFFENDER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS (+) = AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS IN ('IN', 'OUT') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, PROFILE_CODE, DESCRIPTION, MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_, ETHNIC_CODE, IDENTIFIER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Missing Photo
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS IN ('IN', 'OUT') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = 'BMI') AND NOT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID IN (SELECT DT_LATEST_FACIAL_IMAGES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID FROM (SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, OFFENDER_IMAGE_ID, CAPTURE_DATETIME FROM oms_owner.OFFENDER_IMAGES WHERE (OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, CAPTURE_DATETIME) IN (SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MAX(CAPTURE_DATETIME) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMAGES WHERE active_flag = 'Y' AND image_view_type = 'FACE' GROUP BY OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) DT_LATEST_FACIAL_IMAGES))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Reception Address
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS IN ('IN', 'OUT') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = 'BMI') AND NOT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM OMS_OWNER.ADDRESSES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.ADDRESS_USAGES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.OWNER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.ADDRESS_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_USAGE = 'RECEP')))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Home Address
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS IN ('IN', 'OUT') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = 'BMI') AND NOT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM OMS_OWNER.ADDRESSES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.ADDRESS_USAGES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.OWNER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.ADDRESS_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_USAGE = 'HOME')))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME FROM dataset_base_)
